name: react-countdown
description: A countdown component written by react.

scripts.build-umd: rm -rf build/umd && NODE_ENV=production webpack modules/index.js build/umd/react-countdown.js && NODE_ENV=product COMPRESS=1 webpack modules/index.js build/umd/react-countdown.min.js && echo "gzipped, the umd build is `gzip -c build/umd/react-countdown.min.js | wc -c` bytes"

author: gogu
